_header: As we find written in the creed
Title(s): Scottish Legendary ; Legend of the Seven Sleepers
_description: Legend of the Seven Sleepers, in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
as we find wrytine in þe credgud cristine men mon trew of
                    ned…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…& now in hewine fore his gud dedgud reward has til his
                    med

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth

             Scottish Text Society
